#summary this page will contain the CEntry API, what properties it has and the response

= Introduction =

example: 
<h4>User function Logout:</h4> 
CEntry.m_msgType = "Logout"; <BR/>
map EMPTY; <BR/>
return value String "Logout OK"; <BR/>
End of Logout <BR/>

<h3> already gone through: </h3> 

<h4>User function Login:</h4>
CEntry.m_msgType = "Login"; <BR/>
map VALUES: <BR/>
     "user" = user handle; <BR/>
     "password" = user password; <BR/>
validity check for map to match the CEntry value of User is up to client.
return value AUser; <BR/>
End of Login <BR/>
<h4>User function ArrangePayment:</h4>
CEntry.m_msgType = "ArrangePayment"; <BR/>
map VALUES: <BR/>
     "type" will be one of the following :<BR/>
        "type"="monthly" - no additional info requiered <BR/>
        return value in this case will be String "Updated user's Monthly subscription details"; <BR/>
        "type"="yearly" - no additional info requiered <BR/>
        return value in this case will be String "Updated user's yearly subscription details"; <BR/>
        "type"="once"<BR/>
           "cc_num"="123213321" - Credit Card number depicted as a long integer in String; <BR/>
           "cc_expire"="12/01/2000" - Credit Card Expire date depicted as a DB DATE in String; <BR/>
           "cc_id"="123321" - ID / SSN of the Card owner depicted as a long integer in String; <BR/>
      return value in this case will be String "Updated user's credit card details"; <BR/>
      return on failure value in this case will be String "null"; <BR/>
End of ArrangePayment <BR/>

authorization fail will return String "Not authorized to use function \"ArrangePayment()\""
 <BR/>
